admin.name: Awards by Contractor Type
admin.desc: This report displays the dollars and actions for Awards by Contractor Type. The report also allows drilling down to the PIID level.

admin.name: Bundled and Consolidated Contracts Report
admin.desc: This Report Displays the actions and dollars for Bundled and Consolidated Contracts that exceed the threshold that was in place on the date signed of the action.

admin.name: Buy American Act Place of Manufacture Report
admin.desc: This report displays the Actions and Dollars for manufactured end items across the Federal Government using the values of Place of Manufacture.

admin.name: Buying Through Government Acquisition Vehicles Report
admin.desc: The Buying Through Government Acquisition Vehicles report displays actions and dollars for all contract actions (Awards, IDVs, and Modifications) based on Who Can Use on the IDV and based on Department ID for Awards referencing an IDV.

admin.name: Competition Report
admin.desc: This is the official competition report. It provides both a summary level report and detailed drilldowns based on statutory exceptions.

admin.name: Competition Report – OLD
admin.desc: This is the old competition report and does not provide as accurate a representation as the Competition Report.

admin.name: Competitive Procedures, but one Offer Report
admin.desc: This report displays Competed (Competed Under SAP, Full and Open Competition, Full and Open Competition after Exclusion of Sources and Fair Opportunity) data that has only one offer.
admin.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

admin.name: Contract Detail Report
admin.desc: This report provides the complete contractual data for the specified PIID.

admin.name: Contract Termination for Default-Cause Report
admin.desc: This report reflects the "Termination for Default (complete or partial)" and "Termination for Cause" data for the Date range specified.
admin.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

admin.name: Contractor Search
admin.desc: This Report shows Total Actions and Dollars for a given Contractor.

admin.name: Federal Contract Actions and Dollars
admin.desc: This report displays the federal contract actions and dollars for the specified date signed range.

admin.name: Funding Report
admin.desc: This report provides data pertaining to federal funding. It provides total actions/dollars an agency has awarded on behalf of another agency, as well as the total actions/dollars the agency has awarded using their own funds.

admin.name: Geographical Report by Place of Performance
admin.desc: This report provides data on all Awards and Modifications based on the Place of Performance. The report displays the Place of Performance state or country name.

admin.name: Geographical Report by Vendor Location
admin.desc: This report provides data on all Awards, Indefinite Delivery Vehicles, and Modifications based on the vendor location. The report displays the vendor state or country name.

admin.name: IDVs whose Orders are over the Ceiling Amount
admin.desc: This report displays EPA Designated Product and Recovered Materials/Sustainability data for the specified date range and PSC range.
admin.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

admin.name: Individual Data Item Oversight Tracker Report
admin.desc: This report provides the contractual detail required by Agency System Administrators to review their contracts.

admin.name: Inherently Governmental Functions Actions and Dollars
admin.desc: This report displays the actions and dollars for ‘Closely Associated’, ‘Critical Functions’, ‘Other Functions’ and ‘Null Inherently Governmental Functions’ when ‘Service’ is selected for PSC.

admin.name: Local Area Set Aside Report
admin.desc: This report displays the federal actions and the dollars for those activities of major disaster or emergency, where preference was given to the local firms through a local area set-aside.

admin.name: National Interest Action Report
admin.desc: This report provides the National Interest Action data. It provides the contractual data pertaining to federal spending on National Interest Actions such as Katrina, Rita et al.

admin.name: Orders placed after IDV's Last Date to Order
admin.desc: This report displays Orders that are placed after their IDV's Last Date to Order.

admin.name: Orders Referencing Incorrect IDV
admin.desc: This report displays Delivery Orders/Task Orders (DO/TO) and BPA Calls that were placed against an IDV by an agency that does not have the authority to use the Referenced IDV.

admin.name: Other Transaction Actions and Dollars Report
admin.desc: This report displays the Other Transaction actions and dollars for the specified date signed range.

admin.name: Performance Based Acquisition Report
admin.desc: This report displays the actions, dollars and percentages for the performance based acquisition contracts for the specified date range. It also provides drill down capability to view specific report details, including field values for the contract.

admin.name: Potential Vendor Anomaly Report
admin.desc: This report displays all the contracts that are marked as Small Business by contracting officer and the contractor is one of the Top 100 Federal Contractors.
admin.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

admin.name: Procurement History for Market Research Report
admin.desc: This report provides total dollars awarded to all vendors for a Product and Service Code (PSC) given in the search criteria. The dollars are aggregated by the unique entry reported in the Description of Requirents field.

admin.name: Purchase Card as Payment Method Report
admin.desc: This report displays the procurement actions within a specified date range where the Purchase Card was used/not used as a method of payment.

admin.name: Recycled Content Product Purchasing Data Report
admin.desc: The report displays actions and dollars for Product or Service Code (PSC) Categories and how many of them are acquired by Commercial Item procedures at the Federal Government level.

admin.name: Rerepresentation Eligible Actions Report
admin.desc: The report displays actions and dollars for Product or Service Code (PSC) Categories and how many of them are acquired by Commercial Item procedures at the Federal Government level.

admin.name: Rerepresentation Report
admin.desc: The report displays actions and dollars for Product or Service Code (PSC) Categories and how many of them are acquired by Commercial Item procedures at the Federal Government level.

admin.name: Small Business Achievements by Awarding Organization Report
admin.desc: The Small Business Achievements by Awarding Agency displays the dollars, actions, and percentages for small business contracts. The goaling exclusions apply to this report. This report is run by awarding agency.

admin.name: Small Business Competitiveness Demonstration Program Report
admin.desc: The report displays actions and dollars for Product or Service Code (PSC) Categories and how many of them are acquired by Commercial Item procedures at the Federal Government level.

admin.name: Small Business Goaling Report
admin.desc: This report displays the dollars, actions, and percentages for small business contracts. The goaling exclusions apply to this report. This report is run by funding agency.

admin.name: Subcontracting Plan Report
admin.desc: This report displays "Plan Required - Incentive Not Included", "Plan Required - Incentive Included", "Plan Required (Pre 2004)", "Individual Subcontract Plan", "Commercial Subcontract Plan" or "DOD Comprehensive Subcontract Plan" for base documents.
admin.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

admin.name: Sustainability Report
admin.desc: This report displays actions and dollars for the "Recovered Materials/Sustainability" values. Actions with a foreign Place of Performance or a Claimant Program coded as Weapons are excluded from this report.

admin.name: Total Actions by NAICS Report
admin.desc: The report displays actions and dollars for North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Categories and how many of them are acquired by Commercial Item procedures at the Federal Government level.

admin.name: Total Actions by PSC Report
admin.desc: The report displays actions and dollars for Product or Service Code (PSC) Categories and how many of them are acquired by Commercial Item procedures at the Federal Government level.

admin.name: Trade Agreements Report
admin.desc: The report displays actions and dollars for Product or Service Code (PSC) Categories and how many of them are acquired by Commercial Item procedures at the Federal Government level.

admin.name: Unique Vendors Report
admin.desc: This report reflects the number of Unique Vendors in a given Fiscal Year.
admin.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

admin.name: Workload Report
admin.desc: This report displays actions and dollars for all the federal government contracts for various dollar ranges, thus displaying the workload. It also drills down to the workload by Type of Contract and displays actions and dollars for each contract type.

user.name: Awards by Contractor Type
user.desc: This report displays the dollars and actions for Awards by Contractor Type. The report also allows drilling down to the PIID level.

admin.name: Contract Detail Report
admin.desc: This report provides the complete contractual data for the specified PIID.

admin.name: Contract Termination for Default-Cause Report
admin.desc: This report reflects the "Termination for Default (complete or partial)" and "Termination for Cause" data for the Date range specified.
admin.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

admin.name: Contractor Search
admin.desc: This Report shows Total Actions and Dollars for a given Contractor.

admin.name: Federal Contract Actions and Dollars
admin.desc: This report displays the federal contract actions and dollars for the specified date signed range.

admin.name: Funding Report
admin.desc: This report provides data pertaining to federal funding. It provides total actions/dollars an agency has awarded on behalf of another agency, as well as the total actions/dollars the agency has awarded using their own funds.

admin.name: Geographical Report by Place of Performance
admin.desc: This report provides data on all Awards and Modifications based on the Place of Performance. The report displays the Place of Performance state or country name.

admin.name: Geographical Report by Vendor Location
admin.desc: This report provides data on all Awards, Indefinite Delivery Vehicles, and Modifications based on the vendor location. The report displays the vendor state or country name.

admin.name: IDVs whose Orders are over the Ceiling Amount
admin.desc: This report displays EPA Designated Product and Recovered Materials/Sustainability data for the specified date range and PSC range.
admin.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

admin.name: Inherently Governmental Functions Actions and Dollars
admin.desc: This report displays the actions and dollars for ‘Closely Associated’, ‘Critical Functions’, ‘Other Functions’ and ‘Null Inherently Governmental Functions’ when ‘Service’ is selected for PSC.

admin.name: Local Area Set Aside Report
admin.desc: This report displays the federal actions and the dollars for those activities of major disaster or emergency, where preference was given to the local firms through a local area set-aside.

admin.name: Orders placed after IDV's Last Date to Order
admin.desc: This report displays Orders that are placed after their IDV's Last Date to Order.

admin.name: Orders Referencing Incorrect IDV
admin.desc: This report displays Delivery Orders/Task Orders (DO/TO) and BPA Calls that were placed against an IDV by an agency that does not have the authority to use the Referenced IDV.

admin.name: Other Transaction Actions and Dollars Report
admin.desc: This report displays the Other Transaction actions and dollars for the specified date signed range.

admin.name: Performance Based Acquisition Report
admin.desc: This report displays the actions, dollars and percentages for the performance based acquisition contracts for the specified date range. It also provides drill down capability to view specific report details, including field values for the contract.

admin.name: Procurement History for Market Research Report
admin.desc: This report provides total dollars awarded to all vendors for a Product and Service Code (PSC) given in the search criteria. The dollars are aggregated by the unique entry reported in the Description of Requirents field.

admin.name: Purchase Card as Payment Method Report
admin.desc: This report displays the procurement actions within a specified date range where the Purchase Card was used/not used as a method of payment.

admin.name: Rerepresentation Eligible Actions Report
admin.desc: The report displays actions and dollars for Product or Service Code (PSC) Categories and how many of them are acquired by Commercial Item procedures at the Federal Government level.

admin.name: Small Business Achievements by Awarding Organization Report
admin.desc: The Small Business Achievements by Awarding Agency displays the dollars, actions, and percentages for small business contracts. The goaling exclusions apply to this report. This report is run by awarding agency.

admin.name: Small Business Goaling Report
admin.desc: This report displays the dollars, actions, and percentages for small business contracts. The goaling exclusions apply to this report. This report is run by funding agency.

admin.name: Subcontracting Plan Report
admin.desc: This report displays "Plan Required - Incentive Not Included", "Plan Required - Incentive Included", "Plan Required (Pre 2004)", "Individual Subcontract Plan", "Commercial Subcontract Plan" or "DOD Comprehensive Subcontract Plan" for base documents.
admin.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

admin.name: Total Actions by NAICS Report
admin.desc: The report displays actions and dollars for North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Categories and how many of them are acquired by Commercial Item procedures at the Federal Government level.

admin.name: Total Actions by PSC Report
admin.desc: The report displays actions and dollars for Product or Service Code (PSC) Categories and how many of them are acquired by Commercial Item procedures at the Federal Government level.

admin.name: Unique Vendors Report
admin.desc: This report reflects the number of Unique Vendors in a given Fiscal Year.
admin.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

user.name: Awards by Contractor Type
user.desc: This report displays the dollars and actions for Awards by Contractor Type. The report also allows drilling down to the PIID level.

user.name: Bundled and Consolidated Contracts Report
user.desc: This Report Displays the actions and dollars for Bundled and Consolidated Contracts that exceed the threshold that was in place on the date signed of the action.

user.name: Buy American Act Place of Manufacture Report
user.desc: This report displays the Actions and Dollars for manufactured end items across the Federal Government using the values of Place of Manufacture.

user.name: Buying Through Government Acquisition Vehicles Report
user.desc: The Buying Through Government Acquisition Vehicles report displays actions and dollars for all contract actions (Awards, IDVs, and Modifications) based on Who Can Use on the IDV and based on Department ID for Awards referencing an IDV.

user.name: Competition Report
user.desc: This is the official competition report. It provides both a summary level report and detailed drilldowns based on statutory exceptions.

user.name: Competition Report – OLD
user.desc: NOT THE OFFICIAL REPORT FOR COMPETITION. This is the old competition report and does not provide as accurate a representation as the Competition Report.

user.name: Competitive Procedures, but one Offer Report
user.desc: This report displays Competed (Competed Under SAP, Full and Open Competition, Full and Open Competition after Exclusion of Sources and Fair Opportunity) data that has only one offer.
user.verb: This report has been identified as having anomalies in the entered award data.  Agencies should review the report to confirm the integrity of their data.

user.name: Contract Detail Report
user.desc: This report provides the complete contractual data for the specified PIID.
